title: 10 amazing sales happening online this week
text:
10 amazing sales happening online this week

This week has some amazing sales on great stuff at Kohl's, Sur La Table, and more. (Photo: Sur La Table / Kohl's)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

It's impossible to go a single day without something being on sale online. In fact there are hundreds, if not thousands, of new deals and sales to be found every single day. But with so many ads and emails flying around, it can feel impossible to actually catch the sales that you care about. Even if you're vigilant with your email and/or stalk your favorite brands, it can still be a monumental task to stay on top of every sale. So our team scours the most popular retailers every day to find the most impressive sales that you should know about.

This week, there are some solid opportunities to save, whether you need new tools or you want to find some fantastic new furniture.

More: The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Monday

1. Score 20% off at Kohl's this Monday only

From fan favorites like the Instant Pot to fun finds like weighted blankets, Kohl's sitewide sale is a fun one. (Photo: Kohl's)

Kohl’s is often lumped together with Target as a department store that sells essentially everything. It’s way too easy to walk into its giant doors when all you needed was a pack of socks, and walk out with a new small kitchen appliance, some scented candles, and an insanely soft bath mat. It’s even more tempting when they throw some crazy discounts at you, and today is no exception as they’re offering 20% off almost everything online with the code BRISK20. Whether you’re in the market for a popular Instant Pot or a calming Brookstone weighted blanket, you’re sure to find something so you can take advantage of this discount.

Save 20% at Kohl's with the code BRISK20

2. Top power tools are up to 45% off at Home Depot

A good set of power tools doesn't have to break the bank. (Photo: Ryobi)

Having a good set of power tools at home is a must whether you're always working on a new project or just need to put together the occasional piece of furniture or hang some frames here and there. This Monday, Oct. 7, you can find loads of power tools from well-loved brands Milwaukee and Ryobi for as much as 45% off at The Home Depot.

We're big fans of this Ryobi cordless tool kit that includes a drill, circular saw, reciprocating saw, impact driver, and light. It all comes in a convenient bag and is 24% off ($149, down from $197). And you can find a plethora of other power tools, from cordless chainsaws and band saws to shop vacs and tool kits.

Shop the Home Depot Special Buy of the Day

3. Shop Cole Haan's massive sitewide sale

Want stylish shoes that'll last? Cole Haan's sale is the perfect place to start your search. (Photo: Cole Haan)

Cole Haan is ringing in the arrival of fall with their Semi-Annual Event and offering 30% off sitewide until October 15. The brand has been making high-quality, stylish shoes for years and has amassed quite a following, but rarely hosts sales like this one. This discount includes all their boots, flats, bags, accessories and more, including their popular Grand Crosscourt Sneaker (on sale for $83.96) and Men’s Chukka Boot (now $196).

Save 30% at Cole Haan's Semi-Annual Sale

4. Save on a new Nectar mattress

Have your most peaceful sleep yet knowing that you saved on a brand new mattress. (Photo: Nectar)

If you're in the market for a new mattress, but you don't want to shell out a thousand big ones, you should consider Nectar. Not only is the original Nectar one of the best mattresses in a box we've ever tested, but it's also more affordable than the Caspers and Purples of the sleep world. Right now, you can save even more thanks to a sale boasting $100 off any purchase of $500 or more, and they even throw in two pillows (worth $150 if you bought them separately).

Shop the Nectar mattress sale

5. Frye boots are on sale again

Shop boots, booties, and ankle boots galore! (Photo: Nordstrom Rack)

Now that the weather’s getting colder, it’s time to retire our sandals and bring out all our favorite leather and suede boots from the depths of our closets. If you own a pair of iconic Frye boots, they’ve probably become a wardrobe staple and have lasted you for many seasons. If you’ve never owned a pair, well, let’s change that. You can currently save $50 on a $250 purchase with the code 50OFF, $100 off a $400 purchase with the code 100OFF, and $200 off a $750 purchase with the code 200OFF, which are all valid until October 15. While this may seem like a lot, Frye is known for how well-made and long-lasting their boots are, so by investing in one or two pairs, you’ll have boots to wear each fall for many years to come.

Save up to $200 at Frye with one of the above coupon codes

6. Shop so many sales at Wayfair

There's always a sale at Wayfair, so you can find just want you need. (Photo: Wayfair)

Wayfair is a one-stop shop for everything you need to deck out your home, no matter the time of year. Now with the holidays coming up, they’re making sure their customers are prepared with their Head Start Holiday sale, which includes up to 70% off festive decor, wreaths, stockings, Christmas trees, and more—but the savings don’t stop there. They’re also offering up to 50% off Halloween decor and party essentials. If you're not feeling festive just yet, you can also shop their Fall Refresh Sale too, in addition to getting 50% off everything in their warehouse clearance section.

Shop on Wayfair and save up to 70% off

7. Overstock

Save on kitchen tables, bar carts, rugs, and more with this incredible furniture sale. (Photo: Overstock)

Did you know Overstock sells furniture, and at bargain prices to boot? One of our editors recently wound up on Overstock's site, where she found a bed frame that was perfect for her new apartment. If you just moved into a new place, or simply want to give your home a fall refresh, right now until October 8, Overstock is hosting their annual Customer Day sale, where you can score an extra 25% off thousands of items, including furniture, home decor, rugs, mattresses, and so much more. If you need help shopping this massive sale, we put together a roundup of our top picks, such as this Caressa Boho Rug and this Collins Table Lamp.

Shop Overstock’s Customer Day sale and save 25%

8. Sur La Table

This sale is a great chance to get amazing brands for less. (Photo: Sur la Table)

The holidays are fast approaching, which means we should all ensure our kitchens are fully stocked with all the roasting pans, dutch ovens, and other cookware needed to create a memorable feast. If you’re in need of some new pots and pans, appliances or other kitchen tools, you’ll want to check out Sur la Table’s Anniversary Sale while it’s still happening. Right now you can get up to 70% off popular cooking brands, including Staub, All-Clad, Le Creuset, and many more, so don't miss out.

Shop the Sur La Table Anniversary Sale

9. Dyson's best vacuums are $100 off

The best vacuums of 2019 (Photo: Reviewed / Jackson Ruckar)

Dyson is one of those aspirational brands that you always see commercials and ads and think, "Man I'd get one of those things if it wasn't so dang expensive." But they're thankfully a brand than puts their products in more shoppers' reach by running sales and offering discounted refurbished models. Right now they're got savings of up to $100 off on a slew of products, including the best vacuum we've ever tested—the Dyson V11 Torque Drive ($599)—as well as the V11 Animal ($499), which both offer the maximum savings of $100 off the list price. There are plenty of other discounts worth browsing, too.

Shop the Dyson sale

10. Actually print your photos for up to 50% off

Print out your most cherished photo memories with Shutterfly. (Photo: Reviewed / Jackson Ruckar)

There are so many occasions where it just makes sense to print off pictures: an engagement, a wedding, a new home, a pregnancy announcement, and the list just goes on and on. Keeping them on your phone just isn't the same as having them enshrined forever in a frame, in a special place inside your home. Right now, you're especially in luck though, because you can get 50% off everything at Shutterfly, including personalized school gear, no promo code needed. This is our favorite online photo printing service, and you can also get free shipping on orders over $39 with the promo code SHIP39.

Get 50% off everything at Shutterfly

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
